title: "Apple to Halt US Sales of Latest Watches"
text: "Apple will stop selling the latest versions of its smartwatch in the US due to a patent dispute
source_name: taking the devices off the market in the middle of the busy holiday season. Bloomberg Intelligence's Anurag Rana discusses the announcement with Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on ""Bloomberg Technology."

title: "3 AI Stocks Poised for Explosive Growth in 2024"
text: "Businesses and consumers have used artificial intelligence (AI) before 2023
source_name: but ChatGPT's launch thrust the technology into the spotlight. Many AI stocks led the stock market and outperformed major indices."

title: "Approov Identifies and Addresses Apple Watch Security Issues"
sentiment: today revealed new data indicating that watches
type: wearables and new devices are now the weakest link in the mobile app threat landscape. Key findings include: Watches and other wearables now communicate directly with backend APIs and services. An Apple Watch “zero-day” vulnerability was uncovered in September 2023. Unless protected
tickers: watches and wearables will become a rich attack vector for hackers."
